title: Kiko the kangaroo: red hot rhythm
brief_description: Animated film presenting Kiko the kangaroo. The orchestra in a broadcasting studio is playing red hot rhythm music. However the music is so hot that it actually sets the building alight. Kiko and his firemen come to the rescue to put out the fire.
